verses.roman:
bālyāvadhi rāma-nāma-grahaṇa āmāra
tomā dekhi' kṛṣṇa-nāma āila eka-bāra

synonyms: bālya-avadhi—since the days of my childhood; rāma-nāma-grahaṇa—chanting the holy name of Lord Rāmacandra; āmāra—my; tomā dekhi'-upon seeing You; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; āila—came; eka-bāra—once only.
translation: "From my childhood I have been chanting the holy name of Lord Rāmacandra, but upon seeing You I chanted the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa just once.
